member.name: T:NiceLabel.SDK.FormatPreviewSide
member.summary: This enum defines the sides of the format that will be used when acquiring format preview. Preview can contain front side, back side or both sides.

member.name: F:NiceLabel.SDK.FormatPreviewSide.FrontSide
member.summary: The front side of the format.

member.name: F:NiceLabel.SDK.FormatPreviewSide.BackSide
member.summary: The back side of the format.

member.name: F:NiceLabel.SDK.FormatPreviewSide.BothSides
member.summary: Both sides of the format on a single preview.

member.name: T:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintJobStatus
member.summary: Enumeration of the statuses of the print request within the print process.
member.remarks: Print job status will change while the print job is processed. The process starts with creation of the print job and ends when the complete print job is sent to the spooler. Errors can occur when an invalid value is set for a label object for example.

member.name: F:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintJobStatus.Unknown
member.summary: The unknown/uninitialized status.

member.name: F:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintJobStatus.Created
member.summary: Initial status when the print job is created.

member.name: F:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintJobStatus.Printing
member.summary: After the print job was created and is being sent to the spooler, the status is set to .

member.name: F:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintJobStatus.Completed
member.summary: When complete print job is processed and sent to the spooler, the status is set to .

member.name: F:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintJobStatus.Canceled
member.summary: The print job can be canceled by calling method, resulting in the status set to .

member.name: F:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintJobStatus.Error
member.summary: If an error occurs during the print job processing, the status is set to .

member.name: F:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintJobStatus.Waiting
member.summary: When the print job is prepared to be printed, but other print jobs are occupying all available print threads, the status will be set to .

member.name: T:NiceLabel.SDK.SpoolJobStatus
member.summary: Enumeration of statuses of a print job in the print spooler. When a print job is sent to the spooler, according to the spooling process its status will be updated.

member.name: F:NiceLabel.SDK.SpoolJobStatus.Unknown
member.summary: The unknown status.

member.name: F:NiceLabel.SDK.SpoolJobStatus.Spooling
member.summary: Print job is still being sent from the application to the spooler.

member.name: F:NiceLabel.SDK.SpoolJobStatus.Ready
member.summary: Job is ready for printing.

member.name: F:NiceLabel.SDK.SpoolJobStatus.Paused
member.summary: Job is paused.

member.name: F:NiceLabel.SDK.SpoolJobStatus.Error
member.summary: An error is associated with the job.

member.name: F:NiceLabel.SDK.SpoolJobStatus.Printing
member.summary: Job is printing - being in the process of sending from the spooler to the printer.

member.name: F:NiceLabel.SDK.SpoolJobStatus.Printed
member.summary: Job is printed.

member.name: F:NiceLabel.SDK.SpoolJobStatus.Deleted
member.summary: Job has been deleted.

member.name: F:NiceLabel.SDK.SpoolJobStatus.Offline
member.summary: The printer is offline.

member.name: F:NiceLabel.SDK.SpoolJobStatus.PaperOut
member.summary: Printer is out of paper.

member.name: F:NiceLabel.SDK.SpoolJobStatus.UserIntervention
member.summary: Printer has an error that requires the user to do something.

member.name: F:NiceLabel.SDK.ContentType.Other

member.name: T:NiceLabel.SDK.SDKException
member.summary:
Exception class used by the SDK. All exceptions thrown from the SDK are derived from the SDKException.
The list of high level error codes is defined by enum. Detailed information about the error can be monitored using the following members of the exception:
Detailed error message of the error. Can be used to show the error to the user.
Detailed error code of the error. The code can be used by the program to handle the error gracefully.
Description of the exception formatted in the shape suitable to be traced or stored in a log file.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.SDKException.#ctor(NiceLabel.SDK.SDKErrorCode,System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The exception that caused the problem.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.SDKException.#ctor(NiceLabel.SDK.SDKErrorCode,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.SDKException.ErrorCode
member.summary: Gets or sets the error code.
member.value: The error code.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.SDKException.DetailedErrorCode
member.summary: Gets or sets the detailed error code.
member.value: Detailed error code of the error. The code can be used by the program to handle the error gracefully.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.SDKException.DetailedMessage
member.summary: Gets or sets the detailed message.
member.value: Detailed error message of the error. Can be used to show the error to the user.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.SDKException.DebugMessage
member.summary: Gets or sets the debug message.
member.value: Description of the exception formatted in the shape suitable to be traced or stored in a log file.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.SDKException.ToString
member.summary: Returns a that contains exception message. If DetailedMessage is available for the exception, it is appended to the base exception message.
member.returns: A that represents exception message.

member.name: T:NiceLabel.SDK.IDocument
member.summary: Interface to document on the document storage.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IDocument.CreatedTimestamp
member.summary: Gets the time stamp when the document was created.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IDocument.ModifiedTimestamp
member.summary: Gets the time stamp when the document was last modified.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IDocument.Workflow
member.summary: Gets the approval workflow that is used for the document.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IDocument.Revisions
member.summary: Gets a list of available document revisions.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IDocument.FileName
member.summary: Gets the file name of the document.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IDocument.FilePath
member.summary: Gets the full path with file name of the document.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IDocument.IsFolder
member.summary:
Gets a value indicating whether this document is folder.
When retrieving items of particular location in document storage, the returned set of IDocument instances contains documents as well as folders.

member.name: T:NiceLabel.SDK.IDocumentRevision
member.summary: Interface to document revision. When versioning is enabled in Document Storage, several revisions of each document exist. This interface is used to access information about individual revision.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IDocumentRevision.RevisionNumber
member.summary: Gets the revision number. When major and minor revisions are enabled Revision property should be used.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IDocumentRevision.ModifiedTimestamp
member.summary: Gets the time stamp when the document revision was last modified.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IDocumentRevision.Workflow
member.summary: Gets the approval workflow that is used for the document revision.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IDocumentRevision.WorkflowStep
member.summary: Gets the workflow step of the document revision.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IDocumentRevision.IsPublished
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the document revision is in published state.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IDocumentRevision.FileName
member.summary: Gets the file name of the document revision.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IDocumentRevision.FilePath
member.summary: Gets the full path with file name of the document revision.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IDocumentRevision.Revision
member.summary: Gets the revision string. Returns major and minor revision number (Example: “3.5”) or only major number (Example: “3”), depending on configuration of Control Center.

member.name: T:NiceLabel.SDK.IDocumentStorage
member.summary: Interface to document storage. Used to retrieve the document information.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.IDocumentStorage.GetDocuments(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves the document information from document storage server for the specified directory.
member.param: If set to true directories will also be returned.
member.returns: List of documents from the specified directory or null if directory does not exist.
member.remarks: Directory name can be full name with document storage server name (http://server:8080/Labels/) or relative to the document storage server root (/Labels/).

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.IDocumentStorage.GetDocument(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the document information from document storage server for the specified file name.
member.returns: Document for the specified file name or null if file does not exist.
member.remarks: File name can be full name with document storage server name (http://server:8080/Labels/label.nlbl) or relative to the document storage server root (/Labels/label.lbl).

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.IDocumentStorage.SupportsRevisioning
member.summary: Retrieves revisioning configuration of document storage server.
member.returns: True if document storage supports revisioning, false otherwise.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.IDocumentStorage.CheckInDocument(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Checks in document to storage server.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.IDocumentStorage.CheckOutDocument(System.String)
member.summary: Checks out document from storage server.

member.name: T:NiceLabel.SDK.IAuthenticationSettings
member.summary: Interface to authentication settings.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IAuthenticationSettings.AccessToken
member.summary: Gets or sets the access token used for accessing Label Cloud. If not specified then user's token is used (user must be signed in and SDK included with NiceLabel installation must be used).

member.name: T:NiceLabel.SDK.IControlCenterProperties
member.summary: Interface to all Control Center related properties.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IControlCenterProperties.ControlCenterUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the ControlCenter Url. This property can be set only in case when the SDK is used as part of the NiceLabel LMS product and the client where SDK is running is able to connect to existing Control Center. The value of this property will be valid after the call to Initialize method of the IPrintEngine. Once a license is successfully verified, the access to document storage is available and all printing activities can be logged to the ControlCenter.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IControlCenterProperties.IsPrintLoggingEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether print logging is enabled. All printing activities will be sent to ControlCenter when this property is set to True.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IControlCenterProperties.IsPrintLoggingCompleted
member.summary:
Gets a value indicating whether logging to control center has been completed (All print events were sent to the server.).
Sending information to ControlCenter is performed in a background thread. This property can be used when the application is to be closed. Application can verify if all printing activities have already been sent to the ControlCenter. If not, user can be informed and application can wait until the logging is completed.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.IControlCenterProperties.Login(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Logins on the Control Center with specified username and password combination if application authentication is enabled.

member.summary: Gets or sets the fill color of the object.

member.name: T:NiceLabel.SDK.ISolution

member.summary: Gets the full file path of the solution file.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.ISolution.Directory
member.summary: Gets the directory.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.ISolution.FileName
member.summary: Gets only file name without the path.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.ISolution.LabelNames
member.summary: Gets the names of labels in this solution.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.ISolution.OpenLabel(System.String)
member.summary: Opens the label by given label name.
member.param: Name of the label to open.
member.returns: The opened label.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.ISolution.Clone
member.summary: Returns cloned instance of the current ISolution. Every Cloned instance must be released with call to Dispose.
member.returns: Cloned ISolution instance.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.ISolution.CreateXMLSolutionInformation
member.summary: Stores information of the current solution to an XML document.
member.returns: The xml document containing the solution information.

member.name: T:NiceLabel.SDK.ILabel
member.summary: Interface to the label. When a label format is opened from file or from document storage, this interface is used to perform all additional actions like printing, getting preview, etc.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.ILabel.LabelSettings
member.summary: Gets the label settings.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.ILabel.PrintSettings
member.summary: Gets the print settings.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.ILabel.ConversionIssues
member.summary: Gets a list that contains description of potential issues that can arise during the label loading/conversion process.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.ILabel.Variables
member.summary: Gets the list of the variables from the label which are not using any data sources for their initial value.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.ILabel.LabelObjects
member.summary: Gets the list of the label objects used in the label.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.ILabel.DataSets
member.summary: Gets the list of data sets (database connections) used in the label.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.ILabel.FilePath
member.summary: Gets the full file path of the label file.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.ILabel.Revision
member.summary: Gets the file revision.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.ILabel.Directory
member.summary: Gets the directory.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.ILabel.FileName
member.summary: Gets only file name without the path.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.ILabel.Author
member.summary: Gets label author.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.ILabel.Description
member.summary: Gets label description.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.ILabel.Title
member.summary: Gets label title.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.ILabel.SetVariableValues(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets values of multiple variables.
member.param: String containing name-value pairs for variables in each line.
When true, if variable does not exist in the label it is ignored. Otherwise an exception will be thrown.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.ILabel.SetVariableValuesXml(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets values of multiple variables using an XML data format.
member.param: XML document containing names and values for variables in each node.
When true, if variable does not exist in the label it is ignored. Otherwise an exception will be thrown.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.ILabel.GetLabelPreview(NiceLabel.SDK.ILabelPreviewSettings)
member.summary: Gets the preview of the label. Resulting preview depends on the provided settings provided by the input ILabelPreviewSettings.
member.returns: When the settings request the preview to be stored in the file, the return value contains the path to the created file. When in-memory preview is requested, the return value contains image byte array.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.ILabel.Print(System.Int32)
member.summary: Prints the requested number of labels.
member.param: Number of labels to be printed.
member.returns: The returned print request can be used to check for status of the print request and to later follow its spooling status.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.ILabel.PrintAll
member.summary: Prints labels for all available data. This call is used when the label retrieves the data from the database, and labels for all retrieved records should be printed.
member.returns: The returned print request can be used to check for status of the print request and to later follow its spooling status.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.ILabel.PrintAsync(System.Int32)
member.summary: Asynchronously prints the requested number of labels.
member.param: Number of labels to be printed.
member.returns: The returned print request is used to monitor the print process progress and the spooling status of the request.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.ILabel.PrintAllAsync
member.summary: Asynchronously prints labels for all available data. This call is used when the label retrieves the data from the database, and labels for all retrieved records should be printed.
member.returns: The returned print request is used to monitor the print process progress and the spooling status of the request.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.ILabel.PrintToGraphics(NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintToGraphicsSettings)
member.summary: Prints the requested number of labels to graphics.
member.returns: Print to graphics results.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.ILabel.CreateXMLLabelInformation
member.summary: Stores information of the current label to an XML document.
member.returns: The xml document containing the label information.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.ILabel.StartSessionPrint
member.summary: Start the session printing.
member.returns: The print request of started session print. This request must be used in subsequent calls to SessionPrint and EndSessionPrint.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.ILabel.SessionPrint(System.Int32,NiceLabel.SDK.ISessionPrintRequest)
member.summary: Print the requested number of labels for the specified session print.
member.param: The quantity of labels to be printed.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.ILabel.EndSessionPrint(NiceLabel.SDK.ISessionPrintRequest)
member.summary: End the session printing.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.ILabel.Clone
member.summary: Returns cloned instance of the current ILabel. Every Cloned instance must be released with call to Dispose.
member.returns: Cloned ILabel instance.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.ILabel.SaveAs(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Saves label using a specified file name.
File extension options are:
*.nlbl - file is saved as label file.
*.nsln - file is saved as solution file.
member.param: If set to true, the file is overwritten.
member.remarks:
You can load *.lbl files and save them using *.nlbl or *.nsln formats.
You can convert label format (*.nlbl) to solution format (*.nsln).

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.ILabel.StoreToPrinter(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Stores the label to the printer.
member.param: Label name to be used on printer. If this parameter is not specified than the default label name is used.
Store variant defines the printer memory location for label templates. If this parameter is not specified than the store variant defined in the label is used.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.ILabel.CreateLabelVariant(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Creates a review-ready variant of this label.
member.param: The name of the label variant file that is going to be ready for review.
List of data sources for which the value will be provided at the actual print time. If a data source is listed in this field, its value is not locked and can be provided at print time.

member.name: T:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintRequest
member.summary:
Interface to the print request. A print request instance is returned from and methods.
Print requests can be used to monitor the progress of an asynchronous print operation. When synchronous print operation is used, the print request can still be used to monitor the print job status in the spooler, although the print job generation was performed synchronously.

member.name: E:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintRequest.PrintJobStatusChanged
member.summary: Event that is fired when print job status changes.
member.remarks: Print job status is updated during print job generation process. When using synchronous printing, the print job status is always set to Completed once the method completes. When asynchronous printing is used, the status is updated according to the print process progress.

member.name: E:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintRequest.SpoolJobStatusChanged
member.summary: Event that is fired when spool job status changes.
member.remarks: Regardless of synchronous or asynchronous printing, the spool job status can be monitored by the calling application. Doing so the application can monitor the status of the print job in the Spooler.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintRequest.PrintJobStatus
member.summary: Gets the print job status.
member.remarks: When asynchronous printing is used, the application can not assume that after the call completes, the print job is in initial state. Because of background operation, the status could already been updated. It is recommended to read the status immediately after the application subscribes to the event to set correct initial status.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintRequest.SpoolJobStatus
member.summary: Gets the spool job status.
member.remarks: This event is triggered only when MonitorSpoolJobStatus is set to true in PrintSettings.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintRequest.PrintException
member.summary: Gets the print exception if an error occurs during print.
member.remarks: If an error occurred during print job creation, there was an exception created. When the status of the print job is in error state, the PrintException property can be used to determine the cause of the error.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintRequest.PrinterName
member.summary: Gets the name of the printer.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintRequest.LabelName
member.summary: Gets the name of the label.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintRequest.JobName
member.summary: Gets the name of the print job in spooler.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintRequest.RequestedQuantity
member.summary: Gets the requested quantity.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintRequest.Cancel
member.summary: Cancels the print request.

member.name: T:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintServiceSettings
member.summary: Interface to all print service related settings.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintServiceSettings.MaxConcurrentPrintProcesses
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of concurrent print processes.
member.remarks: If the value is set to 0 then the number of concurrent print processes depends on the number of virtual processors. It will be set to the number of virtual processors divided by 2 (or 1 if computer has only 1 processor).

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintServiceSettings.MaxConcurrentSessionPrintProcesses
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of concurrent session print processes.
member.remarks: If the value is set to 0 then the number of concurrent session print processes depends on the number of virtual processors. It will be set to the number of virtual processors divided by 2 (or 1 if computer has only 1 processor).

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintServiceSettings.PageBackgroundColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the page background.
member.value: The color of the page background.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintServiceSettings.PaintPageBackground
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether page background should be painted. If set to false label preview will use up the entire surface.
member.value: True if page background should be painted, otherwise false.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintServiceSettings.Enable32BitProxy
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether 32-bit proxy process will start and process VBScript and 32-bit database operations. 32-bit proxy process is started only in .NET API and when host application runs in 64-bit mode. Setting must be enabled before calling PrintEngine Initialize.
member.value: True if 32-bit proxy process should be enabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintSettings
member.summary: Interface defines the parameters used by the printing process.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintSettings.PrinterName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the printer to be used for printing.
member.value: The name of the printer.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintSettings.SkipLabels
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of labels to be skipped on the first printing page.
member.value: The number of skipped labels.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintSettings.IdenticalCopies
member.summary:
Gets or sets the number of identical label copies. When set to more than one (default value), each label in the print job is multiplied by the copy count.
For example, if the print job would include labels 1, 2 and 3, and the IdenticalCopies is set to 3, the resulting print job will include labels 1, 1, 1, 2, 2, 2, 3, 3, 3.
member.value: The number of identical copies.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintSettings.LabelSets
member.summary:
Gets or sets the number of label sets. When set to more than one, the complete print job is multiplied.
For example, if the print job would include labels 1, 2 and 3, and the LabelSets is set to 3, the resulting print job will include labels 1, 2, 3, 1, 2, 3, 1, 2, 3.
member.value: The number of label sets.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintSettings.OutputFileName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the output file. When defined, instead of sending the print job to the printer, the resulting printer data will be stored to file.
member.value: The name of the output file.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintSettings.MonitorSpoolJobStatus
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether spool job status is monitored in print request.
member.remarks: If this setting is enabled, print request must be disposed after completion to avoid memory leaks.
member.value: True if spool job status is monitored; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintSettings.JobName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the print job in spooler.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintSettings.PrintToPdf
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether print output is saved to PDF document. PDF document path must be specified in property.
member.value: True if print output must be saved to PDF document; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintSettings.AppendToOutputFile
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the print job is appended to the output file.
member.value: True if print job needs to be appended to the output file; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintSettings.Reset
member.summary: Resets the print parameters to their default values.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintSettings.SetParameter(System.String,System.String)
member.summary:
Allows you to set advanced print parameters before printing. Supported parameters are:
- PaperBin - Specifies the tray that contains label media. If the printer is equipped with more than just one paper / label tray, you can control which is used for printing. The name of the tray should be acquired from the printer driver.
- PrintSpeed - Specifies the printing speed. The acceptable values vary from one printer to the other. See printer's manuals for exact range of values.
- PrintDarkness - Specifies the printing darkness / contrast. The acceptable values vary from one printer to the other. See printer's manuals for exact range of values.
- HorizontalOffset - Specifies the left offset for all printing objects. The value for parameter must be numeric, positive or negative, in 0.001mm units.
- VerticalOffset - Specifies the top offset for all printing objects. The value for parameter must be numeric, positive or negative, in 0.001mm units.
- PrintSettings - Specifies the custom printer settings to be applied to the print job. The parameter requires the entire DEVMODE for the target printer, provided in a Base64-encoded string. The DEVMODE contains all parameters from the printer driver at once (speed, darkness, offsets and other).

member.name: T:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintToGraphicsResult
member.summary: When is called, the return value is an instance of this interface.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintToGraphicsResult.FrontSides
member.summary: Gets the front side results.
member.remarks: Based on the print to graphics settings, result can be either a filename or the graphics itself. See for more information.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintToGraphicsResult.BackSides
member.summary: Gets the back side results.
member.remarks: Based on the print to graphics settings, result can be either a filename or the graphics itself. See for more information.

member.name: T:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintToGraphicsSettings
member.summary: Input settings used by method.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintToGraphicsSettings.Quantity
member.summary: Gets or sets the quantity.
member.value: The quantity.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintToGraphicsSettings.PrintToFiles
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether method will save the output graphics to the destination folder as files and return the file paths in the result.
member.value: True if list of file names will be returned; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintToGraphicsSettings.ImageFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the format of the image. Possible values: JPG, PNG, BMP.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintToGraphicsSettings.DestinationFolder
member.summary: Gets or sets the target folder for the output files. When print to files is requested, this property is required. If not provided, an exception is thrown.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintToGraphicsSettings.PrintAll
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether print job should contain all labels or just provided quantity.
member.value: true if labels for all available records from database should be printed; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:NiceLabel.SDK.ISessionPrintRequest
member.summary:
When session printing is used, the print process needs be controlled using this interface.
The method returns an instance of the new print request. Subsequent calls to and need to use this interface. When the instance of session print request is disposed the EndSessionPrint is called automatically if it was not called before manually. The status of the print request can also be monitored using the print job and spooler statuses.

member.name: T:NiceLabel.SDK.IField
member.summary: Interface to the database field in the label.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IField.FieldAlias
member.summary: Gets the field alias.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IField.FieldName
member.summary: Gets the name of the field.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IField.OverloadedValue
member.summary: Gets the overloaded value of the database field. If field value has not been overloaded, the returned value will be empty.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.IField.SetOverloadedValue(System.String)
member.summary: Overloads the value of the field to the provided value.

member.summary: Gets the anchoring point of the object.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.ILabelObject.Size
member.summary: Gets the size of the object.
member.value: The size of the object. If the size is determined by other object's properties (for example Font, FontHeight and Content for text fields), returned value will be (0, 0).

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.ILabelObject.Rotation
member.summary: Gets or sets the object rotation. If the rotation is determined by other object's properties (for example starting and ending point for line), exception will be thrown if a value is assigned.
member.value: The rotation in degrees.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.ILabelObject.Color
member.summary: Gets or sets the color.
member.value: The color of the label object.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.ILabelObject.IsVisible
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the object is visible.
member.value: True if the object is visible; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.ILabelObject.IsOnBackSide
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this object is on back side of the label.
member.value: True if this object is on back side; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.ILabelObject.MoveTo(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Moves the label object to new position.
member.param: The horizontal position of the object in 0.001mm units.
The vertical position of the object in 0.001mm units.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.ILabelObject.MoveBy(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Moves the label object by specified distance.
member.param: The horizontal distance from current position of the object in 0.001mm units.
The vertical distance from current position of the object in 0.001mm units.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.ILabelObject.Resize(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Resizes the label object to the provided size. When the object size is specified by other attributes (like Font, FontHeight and Content for text object), exception will be thrown.
member.param: The new width of the object.
The new height of the object.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.ILabelObject.GetBoundingRectangle
member.summary: Gets the bounding rectangle of the object. This method requires rendering of the label and therefore more processing time.
member.returns: The rectangle of the label object (position and size) in 0.001mm units.

member.name: T:NiceLabel.SDK.IVariable
member.summary: Interface to the variable in the label.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IVariable.Name
member.summary: Gets the variable name.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IVariable.Description
member.summary: Gets the variable description.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IVariable.CurrentValue
member.summary: Gets the current value of the variable. If variable's value has not been set yet, the returned value will be variable's default value.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IVariable.CurrentInputValue
member.summary: Gets the current input value for the variable. If variable's value has not been set yet, the returned value will be variable's default input value.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IVariable.IncrementType
member.summary:
Gets or sets the increment type of the variable. Possible values are:
0 None.
1 Increment.
2 Decrement.
3 Offset.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IVariable.Format
member.summary:
Gets or sets the format of the variable. Possible values are:
0 All.
1 Numeric.
2 Alphanumeric.
3 Letters.
4 Seven bit.
5 Hexadecimal.
6 Other.
Only values 0 - 5 can be set to the variable.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IVariable.IsUsed
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether variable is used in the label.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IVariable.Length
member.summary: Gets or sets the length of the variable. If the value is 0, the variable's length is not limited.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IVariable.IsValueRequired
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether variable value is required.
member.value: True if value is required for the variable; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IVariable.IsFixedLength
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether variable value must have fixed length.
member.value: True if value must have fixed length; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IVariable.IsPrompted
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this variable is prompted. Prompted variable displays a message to the user and lets him enter a value before printing.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IVariable.IncrementStep
member.summary: Gets or sets the value of the increment step. When incrementing is defined, the value defines the difference between two increments.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IVariable.IncrementCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the value of increment count. When incrementing is defined, the value defines after how many labels the value will be changed.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IVariable.PromptText
member.summary: Gets the prompt text of the variable.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IVariable.PromptOrder
member.summary: Gets the prompt order of the variable.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IVariable.DefaultValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the default value of the variable.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IVariable.VariableType
member.summary: Gets the type of the prompt variable.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IVariable.IsPickListEnabled
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether variable has pick list enabled. If pick list is enabled than holds a list of selectable input values for this variable. No other values can be used with this variable if a pick list is defined.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.IVariable.PickListValues
member.summary: Gets a list of selectable input values for this variable. No other values can be used with this variable if a pick list is defined.
member.value: If is True than the returned value is a list of selectable input values otherwise null is returned.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not to override all dataset fields to be of type string.
member.value: True if override; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Gets or sets the trace file. If tracing is required, the property needs to be set prior to calling Initialize method.
member.value: The trace file. When set, PrintEngine activities will be traced to the file.
member.remarks: If a file SDK.NET.trace is found next to the SDK.NET.dll assembly, trace is enabled and that file is set as TraceFile property.

member.summary: Gets the control center properties.

member.summary: Opens the label from a stream and returns the interface to access the object.
member.param: Used by the engine when items (picture, text database, etc.) are located on one of the relative predefined paths.
member.returns: Interface to the label.
member.remarks: If the label can not be opened or an error occurs while opening, an exception will be thrown.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintEngine.OpenLabel(System.IO.Stream,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Opens the label from a stream and returns the interface to access the object.
member.param: Used by the engine when items (picture, text database, etc.) are located on one of the relative predefined paths.
member.returns: Interface to the label.
member.remarks: If the label can not be opened or an error occurs while opening, an exception will be thrown.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintEngine.OpenLabel(System.String)
member.summary: Opens the label from the file and returns the interface to access the object.
member.returns: Interface to the label.
member.exception: Exception can be thrown if the file can not be opened or no labels can be found in the document.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintEngine.OpenSolution(System.IO.Stream,System.String)
member.summary: Opens the solution from a stream and returns the interface to access the object.
member.param: The engine will use the provided path to locate the external items referenced in a solution (pictures, text databases, etc.) The path can be absolute or relative. When using relative path, the start folder is the folder with solution file. Always include the trailing backslash character (when using drives) or trailing forward slash (when using http location in the Document Storage).
member.returns: Interface to the solution.
member.remarks: If the solution can not be opened or an error occurs while opening, an exception will be thrown.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintEngine.OpenSolution(System.IO.Stream,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Opens the solution from a stream and returns the interface to access the object.
member.param: The engine will use the provided path to locate the external items referenced in a solution (pictures, text databases, etc.) The path can be absolute or relative. When using relative path, the start folder is the folder with solution file. Always include the trailing backslash character (when using drives) or trailing forward slash (when using http location in the Document Storage).
member.returns: Interface to the solution.
member.remarks: If the solution can not be opened or an error occurs while opening, an exception will be thrown.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintEngine.OpenSolution(System.String)
member.summary: Opens the solution from the file and returns the interface to access the object.
member.returns: Interface to the label.
member.remarks: If the solution can not be opened or an error occurs while opening, an exception will be thrown.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintEngine.GetDocumentStorage
member.summary: Method returns an instance of DocumentStorage class, which can be used to communicate with DocumentStorage.
member.returns: A new instance of object implementing IDocumentStorage interface.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintEngine.GetSetting(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the setting. For SDK internal use only.
member.returns: The setting value.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintEngine.SetSetting(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Sets the setting value. For SDK internal use only.

member.name: T:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintEngineFactory
member.summary: PrintEngineFactory static class is used to establish the connection between calling application and the SDK.NET PrintEngine. Since SDK.NET file should be placed into separate folder from the application's bin folder, the PrintEngineFactory class resolves assembly loading from that location.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintEngineFactory.SDKFilesPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to the SDK.NET files. This property needs to be set before the IPrintEngine can be used.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintEngineFactory.PrintEngine
member.summary: Gets the print engine interface.

member.name: T:NiceLabel.SDK.LabelPreviewSettings
member.summary: Input settings used by GetLabelPreview to specify label preview properties.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.LabelPreviewSettings.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.LabelPreviewSettings.ConvertAllFieldTypesToString
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not to convert all database fields to string type.
member.value: True if convert types to string; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.LabelPreviewSettings.PreviewToFile
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether graphics file will be used as an output from GetLabelPreview call.
member.value: True if preview will be used as an output; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.LabelPreviewSettings.UseDefaultSize
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether original label size will be used for preview.
member.value: True if the original size will be used; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.LabelPreviewSettings.FormatPreviewSide
member.summary: Gets or sets the format preview side.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.LabelPreviewSettings.ImageFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the format of the image. Possible values: JPG PNG BMP.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.LabelPreviewSettings.Width
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum width of the preview (in pixels).

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.LabelPreviewSettings.Height
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum height of the preview (in pixels).

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.LabelPreviewSettings.Destination
member.summary: Gets or sets the target filename for the preview. When empty, the preview is stored in return value.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.LabelPreviewSettings.ShowSampleValues
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether sample values are shown for data sources.

member.name: T:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintToGraphicsSettings
member.summary: Input settings used by PrintToGraphics method.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintToGraphicsSettings.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintToGraphicsSettings.Quantity
member.summary: Gets or sets the quantity.
member.value: The quantity.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintToGraphicsSettings.PrintToFiles
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether PrintToGraphics method will save the output graphics to the destination folder as files and return the file paths in the result.
member.value: True if list of file names will be returned; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintToGraphicsSettings.ImageFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the format of the image. Possible values: PNG JPG BMP.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintToGraphicsSettings.DestinationFolder
member.summary: Gets or sets the target folder for the output files. When print to files is requested, this property is required, otherwise an exception is thrown.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintToGraphicsSettings.PrintAll
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether print job should contain all labels or just provided quantity.
member.value: true if labels for all available records from database should be printed; otherwise, false.
